identity.name: Panji
identity.desc: I am a highly motivated UI/UX designer with over a year of professional experience. With a passion for creating user-centered designs, I strive to combine aesthetics with functionality to deliver exceptional user experiences.

jobs: Collaborated with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to create user-centered design solutions for web and mobile applications.
Crafting wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity based research plan and concept model result.
Conducted usability testing and incorporated feedback into design iterations.
Worked closely with developers to ensure designs were implemented accurately and efficiently.
Designed and maintained design systems to ensure consistency across different platforms and products.
Conducted user research and usability testing to gain insights into user behavior and preferences.
Created low-fidelity wireframes and prototypes using Figma.
Contributed to the development of design systems and style guides.
Create style guides, wireframe, user interface and prototype.
Collaborated with project manager and developer to implement design solutions
Presented design concepts and solutions to internal teams and key stakeholders.
Create style guides, wireframe, user interface and prototype.
Collaborated with project manager, designer and developer to implement design solutions
Presented design concepts and solutions to internal teams and key stakeholders.
